name: ADHIKAR FOUNDATION
briefDescription: ABOUT ADHIKAR FOUNDATION-:   ADHIKAR FOUNDATION is a registered non-profit organisation it was registered as a trust in September 2017 Under The Trust Registration Act 1882. Adhikar Foundation is a community based and cross disability non-profit organisation and volunteer sector towards empowerment of person with disability and under privileged section of the society and  working with vulnerable groups of children	OUR MISSION-:  To Empower disabled and under previliged People and children through developmental initiatives focusing on –•	EDUCATION,•	 EMPLOYEMENT, •	AWARENESS •	ACCESIBLE ENVIORNMENT•	CULTURAL.
